Detailed Description

A XinxPluginElement is a plugin (a library, PluginElement can be a script :). It's used with PluginSelector.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

XinxPluginElement::XinxPluginElement ( QObject *  plugin,
bool  isStatic = false 
)

Create an object based on a plugin. If the plugin isStatic isModifiable() will return false and isActivated() will return true.

bool XinxPluginElement::isConfigurable (  )  const [virtual]

Return true if the plugin is configurable. A plugin is configurable if plugin() is IXinxPluginConfiguration.
